artist: Engraver: Alessandro Sala; Artist: After Alessandro Bonvicino
description: Virgin and child on pedestal at right;gesturing with right hand at bishop and 4 boys below;
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

in plate in black:[VIRGINI DEIPARE/ ET DIVO NICOLAO/ GALEATIUS ROVELLIUS/ AC
DISCIPULI D/ XXXIX/ Al\'ro Bonvicini vetto il Morello dip.  a. Sala dif., e inc]; on sheet in pencil; [1-157]
title: Virgini diepare et divo Nicolao Galeatus Rovellius ac Discipuli D
